i really wanted to be an actor.

I just finished practicing my bass guitar in the lifeguard station.

content.text: I'm a teacher and I love listening to music in the shower.
I love organizing my files so I can find them easily when I need them.
I once went to the Amazon rainforest, where I encountered a tribe that had never heard of sweet potatoes!
I can swim if I have to, but I prefer to save my energy for my vintage cars.
I just finished practicing my bass guitar in the lifeguard station.
My father was a driver himself.
I have a system for doing laundry that works well for me.
I'm proud of my first home purchase.
I'm glad to hear that. What do you like most about it?
The location is perfect for me and my family, and the backyard is great for entertaining guests.
That sounds really nice. I love having a backyard for entertaining guests.
Me too! It's so much fun to be able to cook out and have people over.
I agree. It's a great way to relax and enjoy the outdoors.
Definitely. I'm glad I decided to buy a house.
Me too. It sounds like you made a great choice
